H0.text: How many balls are on a snooker table at the beginning of a game. 15

H1.text: How many balls are on a snooker table at the beginning of a game. 20

H2.text: How many balls are on a snooker table at the beginning of a game. 18

H3.text: How many balls are on a snooker table at the beginning of a game. 22

A4.text: A snooker ball set consists of 22 unmarked balls: 15 reds, six coloured balls, and one white cue ball.

A5.text: The game is played with 22 balls, comprising a white cue ball, 15 red balls and six other balls—a yellow, green, brown, blue, pink and black—collectively called 'the colours'.
